lead_paragraph: Eddie D'Hondt was fired as general manager of Robert Yates Racing in a shake-up of the struggling team. D'Hondt joined the team in late 2003 and helped guide Elliott Sadler into the inaugural Chase for the championship the next season. But Dale Jarrett and Sadler missed out on the playoffs last year and are currently 12th and 15th in the Nextel Cup standings.
